name: Wasp Nest Trap
body: Complexity Simple Stealth DC 12 Description The ball of mud on the bow is a wasp nest. Although the nest can be avoided physically, itâ€™s attached to the vines that grow on the gangplank, and rigged to detach from the railing soon after one person ascends. - Disable DC 18 Survival (trained) to carefully approach and cut the vines rigged to detach the railing without triggering the wasp nest AC 12, Fort +8, Ref +2 HP 12 Weakness fire 5 Release the Wasps (R) Trigger A creature steps on the gangplank; Effect The vines tighten and cause the wasp nest to fall, releasing a weak wasp swarm.
